name: Lo-Fi Hi-Five
description:
The city is a dreary place, and it's down to you to spread some joy.  High five people as you pass them on the street, brightening up your surroundings with each crisp clap.   Better timed high fives will add more color.  Missing high fives will cause everyone's day to get gloomier.  Brighten up the screen completely to win the day.

Created by:

Jonathan Russell, DeMarco Scarnegie, Brandon Hesslau, Alec Chall, Tyler Houston, Matthew Lopez, and Josh Eckhart

Music by Austin Scarnegie
